How to Use Norton Ghost in Windows 11, 10, 8, 7

Want to create an image, restore image, or clone hard drive via Norton Ghost? This guide will tell you how to use Norton Ghost step by step. It also provides you with an easy alternative.

ByLena Updated on June 5, 2024

Share this:

Table of Contents

  1. About Norton Ghost
  2. How to Use Norton Ghost 15 Step by Step
    1. Image Your Computer with Norton Ghost
    2. Restore Image with Norton Ghost
    3. Clone Disk with Norton Ghost
  3. Best Free Alternative to Norton Ghost
    1. Create Image Backup
    2. Restore Disk & Files
    3. Clone Hard Drive
  4. Conclusion
  5. FAQs about Norton Ghost

üåü Key Takeaways:

ToolsNorton GhostAOMEI Backupper
FunctionsImage Your Computer Restore Image Clone Disk Create Image Backup Restore Disk & Files Clone Hard Drive
Pros‚úî Established reputation ‚úî Powerful imaging and cloning ‚úî Support for RAID arrays‚úî User-friendly interface ‚úî Active development ‚úî Comprehensive backup and clone solutions
Cons‚úñ Discontinued ‚úñ Complex interface ‚úñ Compatibility issues‚úñ Advanced features locked in the free version

About Norton Ghost

Norton Ghost is one disk imaging and cloning tool that firstly developed in the 1990s. It can help you make backup images of the whole hard disk, selected partitions or only those files that mean the most to you. When something goes wrong, Norton Ghost can restore your computer to previous functional status . Besides, it can also help you clone one hard drive to another hard drive.

In a word, if you want to make an image back for your computer or want to clone to the new hard drive, Norton Ghost is not a bad choice. However, now Norton Ghost is no longer available for the Home user. It was discontinued by Symantec in 2013. Indeed you can still download the latest version - Norton Ghost 15, but it only offers a 30-day free trial and then you need to pay for it.

How to Use Norton Ghost 15 Step by Step

Here in this guide, you will get the detailed steps about how to use Symantec Ghost in Windows 11/10/8/7. You can simply search ‚ÄúNorton Ghost 15 download‚Äù via your browser to get the tool. As we have mentioned above, it only offers a 30-day free trial. If you prefer a free tool to help you backup, restore or clone your hard drive, you can refer to the next part to get the best free alternative to Norton Ghost.

Image Your Computer with Norton Ghost

1. Install Norton Ghost and open it. It will run a step-by-step wizard the first time you open it. At last, you will see the Easy Setup interface where you can create a backup at once. You can also click the Cancel option and set the backup task later.

2. On the Home screen, you can create a backup task by clicking Define Backup Wizard or Run or Manage Backups. Here we choose the latter one.

3. The Easy Setup screen will appear.

  • You can click OK to accept the default settings or click a setting to modify it.
  • Or you can click Custom‚Ä¶ to create a backup according to your needs.

4. Finally, click OK to confirm.

Restore Image with Norton Ghost

Click Recover My Files if you want to recover files or folder, or Recover My Computer to make it.

Recover My Files:

1. On Recover My Files screen, you can find the files you want to restore through File and Folder & Recovery Point.

2. Whichever you choose, you can type the file name you need in the box under Find files to recover and click Search to find it.

3. After the scanning, select the file you need and click Recover Files‚Ä¶

Recover My Computer:

On Recover My Computer screen, find and choose the right system restore point and click Recover Now to make it.

üëâ Note: If your computer cannot run Windows normally, you can use the Symantec Recovery Disk CD to help you boot your computer. Depending on which version of the product you have purchased, Symantec Recovery Disk is either included on your product CD or as a separate CD. If you don‚Äôt have a floppy drive, you can create a Norton Ghost Bootable USB instead.

Clone Disk with Norton Ghost

1. Connect your new hard drive to your computer.

2. On the Tools page, click Copy My Hard Drive and follow the steps in the wizard to copy the drive.

üëâ Note: The drivers that are used to run the hardware on one computer will likely not match the drivers on a second computer. So you‚Äôd better not use the Copy Drive feature to set up a hard drive that will be used in another computer.

Best Free Alternative to Norton Ghost

AOMEI Backupper Standard is one backup, restore and clone software designed for Windows users. Support all Windows OS including Windows 11/10/8.1/8/7. It offers more powerful functions compared to Norton Ghost, and it‚Äôs free.

üíú Backup & Restore

  • It offers various backup options for you to choose: system backup , disk/partition backup, file backup and cloud backup.
  • You can create a custom schedule backup based on daily, weekly, monthly, event triggers and USB plug-in mode.
  • You can reduce image size as much as possible with different features, such as compression, splitting, intelligent sector backup, incremental backup, and even without configuring it manually.

üíú Clone

  • Disk Clone: Copy one HDD/SSD/USB drive to another. All data on the source disk will be transferred to the destination. It even allows you to clone larger HDD to smaller SSD and improve SSD disk performance with 4k technology.
  • Partition Clone: Copy a particular partition to another, such as copy NTFS partition.

Download it to have a try! If you are using a server system, such as, server 2003/2008/2012/2016/2019/2022 (including R2 version), try AOMEI Backupper Server !

Download Freeware Win 11/10/8.1/8/7/XP

Secure Download

Create Image Backup

Take disk backup as an example. Follow the step below to backup your computer disk.

1. Click Backup > Disk Backup.

Select the corresponding backup methods if you want to backup system, partition or individual files.

2. Click Add Disk to choose the system disk to be backed up.

3. Choose a destination path to save the disk image. You can save the backup image on a local hard drive, external hard drive, USB flash drive, or network drive, etc. Click Start Backup when you are ready.

üëâ Notes:

  • In case your computer cannot start normally, you can create a bootable media using CD/DVD or USB flash drive in advance to help boot your computer. When your computer goes wrong, you can boot the computer using the bootable media and perform a system restore to get everything back to normal.
  • If you want to upgrade Windows 10 to Windows 11 without losing files, this software is very useful. It backs up everything you want, either in the system partition or entire disk, and you can use it to restore files or system as needed.

Restore Disk & Files

If you have created a backup with AOMEI Backupper, you can easily perform a restore anytime you want. You can choose to restore hard disk drive , the system, partition or files/folders to the point you ever made a backup.

üëâ Notes:

  • With AOMEI Universal Restore feature, you can restore a backup image, system image in particular, created on one computer to another one that has dissimilar hardware installed. It can also help you reinstall the system if you are planning to change the hardware such as motherboard, CPU, etc. Available in higher editions like AOMEI Backupper Professional .
  • If you don‚Äôt create a file backup but you want to perform hard disk image file restore or from other backup types, try the Explore image feature. It requires a professional version as well.

Clone Hard Drive

You can directly clone hard drive to another one with the Disk Clone feature. If you are cloning HDD to SSD, you can make use of the ‚ÄúSSD Alignment‚Äú feature to improve the read/write speed of the destination SSD.

üëâ Notes:

  • The free version of AOMEI Backupper only supports cloning a data disk. To clone a disk with OS installed, you can upgrade to higher versions to enjoy it.
  • The System Clone feature can help you only clone system to new hard drive, which uses less disk space than disk clone. Also, it requires a higher version.

Conclusion

That‚Äôs all for how to use Norton Ghost 15. Indeed Norton Ghost is a good tool for computer backup, restore and clone, but you need to pay for it. Fortunately, there‚Äôs another choice - AOMEI Backupper Standard. This free alternative offers all-around backup options to protect your data all the time.

For backup and restore features, you have 4 corresponding options plus two premium features - Universal Restore and Explore Image. It helps to perform dissimilar hardware restore for system or disk and restore files from other backup types, such as, system, disk, or partition.

For the clone feature, you have two free options plus System Clone. So you can copy boot drive to another one successfully, even to smaller drive. And it is able to accelerate the reading and writing speed of the target disk if it is an SSD.

FAQs about Norton Ghost

1. Is Norton Ghost still available?

Answer: Norton Ghost was officially discontinued by Symantec in 2013. This means that it is no longer available for purchase, and no new updates or official support are provided.

2. Can I still use Norton Ghost on my current system?

Answer: While you can still use Norton Ghost on your system, it may face compatibility issues with newer operating systems and hardware due to its discontinuation and lack of updates.

3. What should I do if I encounter issues with Norton Ghost?

Answer: Since Norton Ghost is discontinued and no longer supported, finding official assistance may be difficult. You might try searching for solutions in user forums, community support sites, or using alternative backup software that is actively supported.

4. How do I migrate my data from Norton Ghost to another backup solution?

Answer: To migrate your data, you can restore your backups created with Norton Ghost to your system and then use another backup solution to create new backups. Alternatively, some backup tools might allow importing Ghost backup files directly.

Si vous √™tes un joueur, vous savez combien il est important que votre syst√®me fonctionne √† pleine capacit√©. M√™me un d√©calage d‚Äôune milliseconde peut signifier ‚ÄúGame Over‚Äù. Cet article vous explique comment optimiser Windows 10 pour les jeux.

Installer DirectX 12

Une application indispensable pour tout joueur.

Utiliser le mode de jeu Windows 10

Il est d√©j√† int√©gr√© √† Windows 10 et d√©die des ressources syst√®me aux jeux.

G√©rer les heures actives

Windows 10 installe les mises √† jour en fonction de ces param√®tres. Configurez-les pour que votre ordinateur ne se mette pas √† jour pendant que vous jouez.

Ajustez les param√®tres des effets visuels

Windows Ex√©cute des graphiques en arri√®re-plan constamment. Modifiez vos param√®tres pour vous concentrer sur le jeu.

G√©rer les mises √† jour automatiques de Steam

M√™me probl√®me que pour les Windows 10 heures actives.

D√©sactiver les notifications

Allez dans vos ‚Äúparam√®tres de notifications et d‚Äôactions‚Äù et d√©sactivez les notifications.

R√©gler le panneau de contr√¥le NVIDIA

Modifiez les param√®tres tels que ‚ÄúAmbient Occlusion‚Äù et ‚ÄúAnisotropic Filtering‚Äù.

R√©gler le centre de contr√¥le AMD/ATI

Activez les options ‚Äú Image Sharpening ‚Äú et ‚Äú Overclocking ‚Äú pour am√©liorer les performances.

R√©duire la r√©solution dans un jeu

V√©rifiez les param√®tres du jeu et baissez-les d‚Äôun cran ou deux.

D√©sactiver l‚Äôacc√©l√©ration de la souris

Ce n‚Äôest pas un probl√®me de performance du PC, mais cela rendra les mouvements de votre souris plus pr√©cis.

Utilisez une carte SSD

La mise √† jour vers le SSD peut r√©duire consid√©rablement les temps de chargement.

Mettez √† niveau votre GPU/CPU

Veillez √† v√©rifier la m√©moire et la bande passante avant de faire un achat.

Mettez votre RAM √† niveau

Le minimum de base est de 8 Go. Les titres plus r√©cents n√©cessitent 12 Go. Mais vous aurez besoin de 16 √† 32 Go pour rester au top.

D√©sactiver l‚Äôalgorithme de Nagle

Aide √† am√©liorer la latence de votre connexion.

Mettez √† niveau le GPU et la RAM de votre ordinateur portable

Confiez l‚Äôinstallation √† un technicien si vous n‚Äôavez pas l‚Äôexp√©rience des ordinateurs portables.

D√©sactiver les services d‚Äôarri√®re-plan Windows

D√©sactivez les services d‚Äôarri√®re-plan pour acc√©l√©rer votre ordinateur portable Windows.

Afficher plus

Choix sp√©cial : Gecata by Movavi

Click here

T√©l√©charger gratuitement

T√©l√©charger gratuitement

Un facteur cl√© qui peut ralentir votre exp√©rience de jeu est l‚Äôutilisation d‚Äôun enregistreur de qualit√© inf√©rieure pendant le jeu. C‚Äôest pourquoi notre choix sp√©cial pour optimiser votre PC pour les jeux sur Windows 10 est Gecata by Movavi. Ce programme peut enregistrer le gameplay en 4K et jusqu‚Äô√† 120 FPS sans perte de performance. Il est facile √† utiliser et est livr√© avec une version d‚Äôessai gratuite.

Qu‚Äôest-ce qu‚Äôun FPS faible et comment puis-je le v√©rifier ?

Si votre jeu commence √† ralentir et que l‚Äôimage est saccad√©e, surtout lorsqu‚Äôelle bouge, c‚Äôest que votre taux d‚Äôimages par seconde (IPS) est faible. Cela se produit lorsque le mat√©riel de votre ordinateur a du mal √† faire fonctionner votre jeu ou fait des heures suppl√©mentaires. S‚Äôil travaille trop, la vitesse du jeu ralentit.

La carte graphique travaille pour rendre les images fixes, ou frames, pendant que vous jouez √† un jeu. Elle travaille en collaboration avec d‚Äôautres composants mat√©riels tels que la RAM, le CPU et le GPU pour cr√©er une exp√©rience de jeu compl√®te. En cas d‚Äôarr√™t de l‚Äôun de ces composants, votre FPS commencera √† baisser. La plupart des joueurs pr√©f√®rent un taux de 60 FPS en jouant, mais la plupart des jeux sont en fait tr√®s bien √† 30 FPS.

Le PC surpasse les consoles √† cet √©gard, car il est toujours possible d‚Äôacc√©l√©rer le taux de FPS sur un PC avec des modifications, alors que modifier une console n‚Äôest pas possible. Les joueurs sur PC peuvent √©galement augmenter la fr√©quence de rafra√Æchissement de leur √©cran, modifier d‚Äôautres param√®tres syst√®me pour le jeu, et bien plus encore.

Cet article vous pr√©sente les r√©glages de performance pour les jeux que vous pouvez effectuer sur Windows 10 pour am√©liorer votre exp√©rience de jeu.

Avant de commencer, il est toujours bon d‚Äôavoir un compteur de FPS dans le jeu, afin de pouvoir suivre vos progr√®s et tester les r√©glages qui fonctionnent. De nombreux jeux les ont pr√©install√©s, mais si vous installez MSI Afterburner , vous ne serez jamais sans cet outil utile dans n‚Äôimporte quel jeu.

Comment rendre Windows 10 plus rapide pour les jeux (corrections rapides)

Vous voulez savoir comment rendre Windows 10 plus rapide pour jouer avec une solution rapide ? Suivez ces conseils et recommencez √† jouer !

R√©gler les param√®tres graphiques d‚Äôun jeu

Chaque jeu poss√®de des param√®tres graphiques sp√©cifiques qui peuvent vous aider √† optimiser votre exp√©rience de jeu. En voici trois que vous devriez v√©rifier dans le menu des param√®tres du jeu avant de jouer.

  1. Anti-cr√©nelage : Lorsqu‚Äôun jeu utilise le cr√©nelage, il corrige les petites lignes irr√©guli√®res et in√©gales autour de textures ou d‚Äôobjets sp√©cifiques. Pensez aux lignes floues que vous voyez lorsque l‚Äôherbe appara√Æt dans la plupart des jeux. Chaque jeu poss√®de diff√©rents niveaux d‚Äôanticr√©nelage (SSAA, TAA, MSAA, etc.). - et vous pouvez g√©n√©ralement les modifier dans les param√®tres du jeu pour obtenir de meilleures performances.
  2. Flou de mouvement : Pour rendre les choses plus r√©alistes, les jeux int√®grent des flous de mouvement afin d‚Äô√©muler la vie r√©elle. Le d√©sactiver peut souvent vous aider √† √©conomiser de la puissance graphique.
  3. Synchronisation verticale : Parfois, lorsque vous vous d√©placez rapidement, la carte graphique ne peut pas suivre et l‚Äô√©cran semble se d√©chirer en son milieu. La synchronisation verticale aide √† r√©soudre ce probl√®me mais ajoute un certain d√©calage. Une fa√ßon de corriger ce probl√®me est d‚Äôutiliser le VSync adaptatif ou le Triple Buffering. Vous utiliserez davantage de puissance de la carte graphique, mais vous trouverez un juste milieu entre les d√©chirures et le d√©calage.

Mettez √† jour les pilotes de votre GPU

Le GPU (Graphics Processing Unit) est crucial pour votre exp√©rience de jeu et pour les performances de votre PC dans les jeux, mais vous devez maintenir les pilotes de votre GPU √† jour pour en profiter. De plus, un pilote obsol√®te peut entra√Æner des bogues, des probl√®mes et des pannes du syst√®me. Nous vous recommandons donc de prendre ce probl√®me au s√©rieux et de prendre soin de vos pilotes.

Bien que Windows 10 ne mette pas automatiquement √† jour les pilotes de votre GPU, les fabricants cr√©ent souvent des logiciels sp√©ciaux sous la forme de panneaux de contr√¥le GPU qui effectuent des v√©rifications r√©guli√®res des mises √† jour et vous avertissent si une nouvelle mise √† jour est disponible. N‚Äôignorez pas ces notifications, car le processus de mise √† jour prend peu de temps et peut vous √©viter bien des ennuis pendant le jeu.

Par exemple, selon le fabricant de votre GPU, vous pouvez t√©l√©charger soit Radeon Software Adrenaline, soit GeForce Experience. Ces deux programmes v√©rifient les mises √† jour automatiques et proposent des options d‚Äôoptimisation puissantes. De plus, GeForce Experience comprend un logiciel de capture et de streaming de jeux et fournit des pilotes sp√©ciaux Game Ready, con√ßus par NVIDIA en collaboration avec les principales soci√©t√©s de d√©veloppement de jeux.

Vous pouvez mettre √† jour votre pilote directement √† partir des propri√©t√©s Windows, mais le moyen le plus s√ªr d‚Äôobtenir le dernier pilote est d‚Äôaller directement sur le site Web du fabricant, de choisir votre mod√®le de GPU et de v√©rifier les mises √† jour.

Si vous ne connaissez pas les sp√©cifications de votre GPU, faites un clic droit sur le Bureau, choisissez Param√®tres d‚Äôaffichage, puis Param√®tres d‚Äôaffichage avanc√©s et cliquez sur Propri√©t√©s de l‚Äôadaptateur d‚Äôaffichage.

Voici quelques liens vers les mises √† jour des pilotes des fabricants les plus populaires :

  • Pilotes AMD
  • Pilotes NVIDIA
  • Pilotes Intel Graphics

Installer DirectX 12

DirectX 12 est un outil indispensable pour quiconque souhaite jouer √† des jeux sur Windows 10. Pour faire simple, DirectX est l‚Äôapplication que le jeu utilise pour communiquer avec votre ordinateur et lui dire quoi faire. DirectX 12 est une grande am√©lioration par rapport √† son pr√©d√©cesseur, DirectX 11, car il permet aux cartes graphiques de tirer des ressources de plus d‚Äôun c≈ìur du processeur d‚Äôun PC, ce qui augmente les fr√©quences d‚Äôimages, am√©liore les effets graphiques et r√©duit la consommation d‚Äô√©nergie. Des tests ont montr√© une diff√©rence de 85 √† 300 % dans les performances de jeu entre la version 11 et la version 12.

Pour b√©n√©ficier des fonctionnalit√©s de DirectX 12, le jeu doit avoir √©t√© d√©velopp√© avec cette version. La bonne nouvelle est que la liste de ces jeux s‚Äôallonge chaque jour, car de plus en plus de soci√©t√©s de jeux adoptent cette version.

Pour v√©rifier que vous disposez de la derni√®re version de DirectX, appuyez sur la touche Windows + R, tapez ‚Äúdxdiag‚Äù et cliquez sur OK. L‚Äôoutil de diagnostic DirectX s‚Äôouvre.

Si vous n‚Äôavez pas DirectX 12, allez-y et installez-le ; le processus ne prendra que quelques minutes. Appuyez sur la touche Windows + I, choisissez Mise √† jour et s√©curit√© et cliquez sur V√©rifier les mises √† jour dans l‚Äôonglet Windows. Mise √† jour. Attendez que l‚Äôinstallation se termine.

Introduzione

In questa guida completa, esamineremo i dettagli di questo problema, esploreremo le possibili cause e forniremo una variet√† di soluzioni per garantire che tu possa digitare senza problemi nella barra di ricerca di Windows 10.

Capire il Problema di Non Poter Digitare nella Barra di Ricerca su Windows 10

La barra di ricerca di Windows 10 funge da strumento centrale per un accesso rapido alle app, ai file e alle impostazioni. Quando ti ritrovi impossibilitato a digitare in questa funzione essenziale, sorgono preoccupazioni riguardo alla funzionalit√† del sistema e alla produttivit√†. Le possibili cause di questo problema sono:

Problemi con Cortana o i Servizi di Ricerca

Interruzioni in Cortana o nel servizio di Ricerca di Windows possono portare alla non reattivit√† della barra di ricerca.

File di Sistema Corrotti

La corruzione dei file di sistema pu√≤ influenzare la funzionalit√† della barra di ricerca, rendendola non reattiva all‚Äôinput dell‚Äôutente.

Interferenze di Terze Parti

Alcune applicazioni di terze parti o conflitti software potrebbero interferire con il corretto funzionamento della barra di ricerca.

Soluzioni: Ripristinare la Funzionalit√† della Barra di Ricerca di Windows 10

Ora, esploriamo cinque soluzioni per affrontare il problema di non poter digitare nulla nella casella di ricerca su Windows 10, garantendo un‚Äôesperienza utente fluida.

Soluzione 2: Esegui il Risolutore dei Problemi di Ricerca e Indicizzazione

Soluzione 4: Controlla gli Aggiornamenti di Windows

Soluzione 5: Crea un Nuovo Account Utente

Utilizza AOMEI Backupper per la Protezione del Sistema su Windows 10

How to Add Ringtones to iPhone 7(Plus): 3 Easy Ways 2024

How to add ringtones to iPhone 7 or change ringtones on iPhone 7 to your favorite songs? Read this post to learn how to put or set custom ringtones on your iPhone 7 easily.

ByDylan / Updated on September 4, 2024

Share this:

Table of Contents

  1. Method 1. How to Add Ringtones to iPhone 7 with iTunes
    1. Part 1. Customize ringtones with iTunes
    2. Part 2. Add custom ringtones to iPhone 7
  2. Method 2. How to Put Ringtones on iPhone 7 via GarageBand
  3. Method 3. How to Add Ringtones on iPhone from PC [Recommended]
  4. How to Set Custom Ringtone on iPhone 7 after the Process
  5. Conclusion

Adding ringtones to iPhone 7 may be difficult for some people. Although iPhone comes with some default ringtones for users, it can‚Äôt meet the needs or preferences of people. Especially, most people would like to set their favorite music song as ringtone on iPhone 7. Because it will make iPhone 7 special and charming.

So how to add ringtones to iPhone 7? Keep reading on this tutorial, we will show you the instructions to add or set ringtones on iPhone 7/iPhone 7 Plus.

Method 1. How to Add Ringtones to iPhone 7 with iTunes

iTunes can be a good way to add ringtones to an iPhone. It can help you to customize ringtones and add music to iPhone 7. Here are the details you can follow.

Part 1. Customize ringtones with iTunes

1. Open and update iTunes to the newest version.

2. Select the song you want to set as ringtone. (Remember that the song will last 30 seconds at most.)

3. Right-click the song and choose to Get Info to set the start and stop times on the song.

4. Right-click the same song and select Create AAC Version.

5. Right-click the song segment and choose Show in Windows Explorer. Then change the extension from ‚Äú.m4a‚Äù to ‚Äú.m4r.‚Äù.

6. Copy the file & delete the old one.

Part 2. Add custom ringtones to iPhone 7

1. Click Music at the bottom of the iTunes menu bar and select Ringtone. In the ringtone interface, copy the .m4r file from local to Music.

2. Now connect your iPhone 7 to computer via the USB cable.

3. Click the device icon and choose Summary. Check the option Manually manage music and videos. Click Apply to confirm.

4. Choose Tones > Sync Tones to your iPhone 7.

? Tips:

  • If the song you liked is not in the iTunes library, you can click File > Add Folder to Library > browse your computer and select the song you want to set as a ringtone to iTunes library.
  • If Tones not showing in iTunes , you may need to choose another available way to make it.

Method 2. How to Put Ringtones on iPhone 7 via GarageBand

Sometimes the song which you want to set as a ringtone stored on iPhone 7, you can set the song as ringtone on iPhone 7 directly. The GarageBand can help you convert songs in your Music Library to iPhone ringtones. Download GarageBand free from the App Store and check the one-by-one steps to see how to set a song as a ringtone on iPhone 7.

1. Open GarageBand on iPhone 7 > Click ‚Äú+‚Äù in the top right corner > Tap TRACKS > Scroll down to choose AUDIO RECORDER interface.

2. Click ‚Äú+‚Äù in the top right corner > Choose Section A in Song Sections > Turn off Automatic option > Tap the arrow to change the number to 12 > Tap Done.

‚ö†Ô∏èNote:

  • If this value is more than 12, then it will trim your ringtone automatically. So please make sure it is up to 12 max, or it should be lesser than that.

3. Click the View button > Choose Loop Browser button at the top right-hand corner > Tap Music to choose the song you want to convert.

4. Tap and hold the song to add it to GarageBand > Use the trimming and split editing features to edit the 30 seconds ringtone.

5. Tap the downward-pointing triangular > Tap My Songs to save the audio you just create.

6. Long press the song > Tap Share > Choose Ringtone > Rename the ringtone > Tap Use sound as‚Ä¶ > Choose from Standard Ringtone, Standard Text Tone, Assign to contact based on your choices. (Standard Ringtone is preferred.)

? Tips:

  • Standard Ringtone: Set the customized ringtone as standard ringtone.
  • Standard Text Tone: Use the ringtone as your standard text or notifications tone.
  • Assign to contact: Associate a ringtone with one of your contacts.

Method 3. How to Add Ringtones on iPhone from PC [Recommended]

What will be the easiest way to add ringtones to your iPhone, that‚Äôs the professional ringtone maker - AOMEI FoneBackup !

?Advantages:
Easily edit iPhone ringtones from PC and transfer them to your device.
Various audio file types can be directly converted to m4r and then you can directly find them in your iPhone Settings.
Fast transfer speed allows you to efficiently transfer multiple audio files in a very short time.
Wide compatibility lets AOMEI FoneBackup can support various iOS devices and versions including the latest ones.

Now go for it now and discover more!

Download FreewareWin 11/10/8.1/8/7/XP

Secure Download

Step 1. Launch AOMEI FoneBackup on Windows PC > Connect your iPhone to the computer > Go to Phone Transfer > Choose PC to iPhone and click Get Started.

Step 2. Click the Ringtones option > Drag and drop the files you need to the box.

Step 3. Confirm the ringtones you need > Click Start Transfer to begin the task.

Click here

How to Set Custom Ringtone on iPhone 7 after the Process

After you have put the newly created ringtones on your iPhone 7(Plus) with iTunes, GarageBand or AOMEI FoneBackup, you can now change your iPhone ringtone by setting a custom one in Settings. Go to Settings on your iPhone 7 > Sounds & Haptics > Ringtone > Select the ringtone you just added to your iPhone.

Conclusion

Now you have learned about adding ringtones to iPhone 7/iPhone 7 Plus. To put ringtones on iPhone 7 directly, you can use GarageBand to set a song as a ringtone. Or if you have stored songs on computer, you can add ringtones to iPhone 7 with iTunes or AOMEI FoneBackup.

And you can set custom ringtones on iPhone 7 with default ringtones. What‚Äôs more, if you want to edit your ringtones or music songs on iPhone 7 with ease, AOMEI FoneBackup is also a good choice for you (Toolbox > Ringtone Maker).

Complete Step-by-Step Tutorial: Rescuing Your Data From a Ransomware Strike (Updated)

  1. MyRecover >
  2. Windows Data Recovery >
  3. How to Recover Files from Ransomware Attack [Full Guide 2022]

Disclaimer: This post includes affiliate links

If you click on a link and make a purchase, I may receive a commission at no extra cost to you.

How to Recover Files from Ransomware Attack [Full Guide 2022]

This page covers 4 ways on how to recover files from ransomware and offers some tips that can help you prevent ransomware attacks.

ByKelsey / Updated on April 2, 2024

Share this:

Table of Contents

  1. Is it possible to recover data from ransomware?
  2. How to recover files from ransomware attack in 4 ways
    1. Method 1. Recover files from ransomware with data recovery software
    2. Method 2. Recover ransomware infected files via Backup and Restore
    3. Method 3. Get back files from ransomware using File History
    4. Method 4. Recover from ransomware through system restore
  3. Conclusion

Is it possible to recover data from ransomware?

I‚Äôm looking at a computer after it‚Äôs been hit by some ransomware. The files have been encrypted. I am trying some guides in removal and recovery, but they don‚Äôt seem to be of much help. If you have suggestions on how to recover files from ransomware, I would appreciate it.

When a storage device or computer is infected by a ransomware virus, your files may be encrypted, deleted, hidden, or modified, and inaccessible. Fortunately, aside from paying for a decryption key, there are several easy and free ways that you can use to perform ransomware data recovery.

If you are looking for methods on how to recover ransomware-infected files, you have come to the right place. In the following chapter, we will show you some practical ways to recover lost data from ransomware attacks.

Click here

How to recover files from ransomware attack in 4 ways

Many solutions are available for you to solve how to recover data from ransomware attacks. We have selected some easy-to-implement methods for you. Read below for detailed information.

Method 1. Recover files from ransomware with data recovery software

Usually, ransomware removes the original data after the intrusion. The encrypted files it creates are not the original files, but copies. Therefore, with the help of professional data recovery software, you can easily retrieve your original files deleted by ransomware.

MyRecover is fully-featured ransomware data recovery software that allows you to restore lost data from infected hard drives under trojan, malware, worms, and various virus attacks, and from system crashes.

With this tool, you can recover deleted files , photos, audio, music, emails, and hundreds of other types of files without any effort. It supports you to recover lost data from hard drives, USB flash drives, memory cards, SD cards, emptied Recycle Bin, etc.

Simply download and install this software on your computer, and then follow the steps below to learn how to recover data from ransomware:

Download SoftwareWin 11/10/8/7/Server

Secure Download

Step 1. Select location and start scan

Run MyRecover, hover the mouse over the drive and click Scan to scan.. If your files are lost from an external hard drive like a USB drive, please plug it into your PC in advance.

Step 2. Locate and preview your lost/deleted files

The recovery tool will automatically start looking for all the deleted and lost files.

Click here

Step 3. Recover selected files

You can expand the Deleted files folder and Other missing files folder to select the desired items, then click Recover x files to begin ransomware attack recovery now.

Method 2. Recover ransomware infected files via Backup and Restore

If you have a backup available, restoring files is as simple as ABC. You can easily recover encrypted files by finding the corresponding backup file and restoring the data you need. But this option is possible only when you regularly back up your data.

The how to recover ransomware encrypted files guide is instructed as follows. You can simply initiate a data restoration from Windows backup created through the Backup and Restore software when all your files have been encrypted by ransomware.

Step 1. Open Control Panel and click on System and Security. Then, hit Backup and Restore (Windows 7).

Step 2. Tap on the Restore my files position in the Restore tab.

Step 3. Click Browse for files to locate your lost data and choose to save your recovered files in your original location or another destination as needed.

Method 3. Get back files from ransomware using File History

If you have used File History to save a copy of your precious data, you can follow the steps below to figure out how to recover encrypted files from ransomware. You can use this tool to recover permanently deleted folders and files on your computer as well.

Step 1. Go to Control Panel > System and Security, and click on File History.

Step 2. Press the Restore personal files button on the left panel. Please make sure your File History is turned on.

Step 3. Find the files you want to recover and click the arrow pointing left or right to choose the version you need. And then, click the Recover button.

Method 4. Recover from ransomware through system restore

If you have created a restore point for your system, the system restore can bring your PC back to a previous point in time. This means that you can get back files on your computer that have been encrypted by ransomware through a system restore point.

Next, let‚Äôs have a look at how to recover files infected by ransomware from a system restore.

Step 1. Press Win + S to open the Windows search box, type Create a restore point, and click Open from the list of results.

Step 2. Click on System Restore > Next.

Step 3. Choose a restore point from the list and tap on Scan for affected programs to check the items that will be deleted after the restore. Then, click Close.

Step 4. Press Next. Confirm the selected restore point and click Finish. Then, hit Yes to begin the recovery of deleted files .

If there is no restore point, it might be because the system protection isn‚Äôt turned on. You can check Protection Settings on the System Protection tab. If the Protection Settings for your system drive shows as Off, you can click on Configure > Turn on System protection, and then OK to turn it on.

Notes:‚úé‚Ä¶

Some ransomware decryption tools can help to decrypt files encrypted by ransomware. However, such tools do not fully guarantee that ransomware-encrypted files can be recovered. Thus, recovering files infected by ransomware using a ransomware recovery service like MyRecover or with the help of a backup file are the easiest and most workable ways.

Some tips on preventing ransomware

To prevent ransomware from attacking your computer and files again, we list several tips for you:

  • Make sure the antivirus software is enabled on the computer.
  • Don‚Äôt click on emails and connections sent by strangers.
  • Report ransomware attacks to let authorities identify the attacker.
  • Regularly back up important data in case of emergencies.

Conclusion

Ransomware can‚Äôt be prevented. Though there are multiple ways for you to accomplish how to recover files from ransomware, prevention is easier than rescue. We highly recommend you backup your important data periodically.

Introduzione

Incontrare il problema di non poter digitare nella barra di ricerca di Windows 10 pu√≤ essere frustrante, interrompendo il flusso di lavoro e ostacolando la navigazione efficiente. In questa guida completa, esamineremo i dettagli di questo problema, esploreremo le possibili cause e forniremo una variet√† di soluzioni per garantire che tu possa digitare senza problemi nella barra di ricerca di Windows 10.

Capire il Problema di Non Poter Digitare nella Barra di Ricerca su Windows 10

La barra di ricerca di Windows 10 funge da strumento centrale per un accesso rapido alle app, ai file e alle impostazioni. Quando ti ritrovi impossibilitato a digitare in questa funzione essenziale, sorgono preoccupazioni riguardo alla funzionalit√† del sistema e alla produttivit√†. Le possibili cause di questo problema sono:

Problemi con Cortana o i Servizi di Ricerca

Interruzioni in Cortana o nel servizio di Ricerca di Windows possono portare alla non reattivit√† della barra di ricerca.

File di Sistema Corrotti

La corruzione dei file di sistema pu√≤ influenzare la funzionalit√† della barra di ricerca, rendendola non reattiva all‚Äôinput dell‚Äôutente.

Interferenze di Terze Parti

Alcune applicazioni di terze parti o conflitti software potrebbero interferire con il corretto funzionamento della barra di ricerca.

Soluzioni: Ripristinare la Funzionalit√† della Barra di Ricerca di Windows 10

Ora, esploriamo cinque soluzioni per affrontare il problema di non poter digitare nulla nella casella di ricerca su Windows 10, garantendo un‚Äôesperienza utente fluida.

Soluzione 1: Riavvio dei Servizi Cortana e Ricerca di Windows

Passo 1. Apri il Task Manager:

Passo 2. Trova Cortana e Esplora file di Windows:

Passo 3. Riavvia i Servizi:

Passo 4. Prova a Digitare nella Barra di Ricerca:

Prova a digitare nella barra di ricerca dopo aver riavviato i servizi.

Soluzione 2: Esegui il Risolutore dei Problemi di Ricerca e Indicizzazione

Passo 1. Apri Impostazioni:

Vai su ‚ÄúImpostazioni‚Äù e seleziona ‚ÄúAggiornamento e Sicurezza.‚Äù

Passo 2. Naviga verso Risoluzione dei Problemi:

Nella barra laterale sinistra, scegli ‚ÄúRisoluzione dei Problemi.‚Äù

Passo 3. Esegui il Risolutore dei Problemi di Ricerca e Indicizzazione:

Fai clic su Risoluzioni aggiuntive, fai clic su ‚ÄúRicerca e Indicizzazione‚Äù, e premi ‚ÄúEsegui il risolutore dei problemi.‚Äù

Passo 4. Segui le Istruzioni Visualizzate:

Segui le istruzioni visualizzate per completare il processo di risoluzione dei problemi e verifica se il problema di non poter digitare nella barra di ricerca di Windows √® risolto.

Soluzione 3: Ricostruisci le Opzioni di Indicizzazione

Passo 1. Accedi alle Opzioni di Indicizzazione:

Apri il Pannello di Controllo e cerca ‚ÄúOpzioni di Indicizzazione.‚Äù

Passo 2. Clicca su ‚ÄúAvanzate‚Äù:

Nella finestra delle Opzioni di Indicizzazione, clicca su ‚ÄúAvanzate.‚Äù

Passo 3. Ricostruisci l‚ÄôIndice:

Sotto la scheda Opzioni Avanzate, clicca su ‚ÄúRicostruisci.‚Äù

Passo 4. Attendi il Completamento:

Permetti al processo di indicizzazione di completarsi. Successivamente, controlla se il problema di non poter digitare nella barra di ricerca di Windows 10 persiste.

Soluzione 4: Controlla gli Aggiornamenti di Windows

Passo 1. Apri Impostazioni:

Vai su ‚ÄúImpostazioni‚Äù e seleziona ‚ÄúAggiornamento e Sicurezza.‚Äù

Passo 2. Controlla gli Aggiornamenti:

Clicca su ‚ÄúAggiornamento di Windows‚Äù e seleziona ‚ÄúVerifica aggiornamenti.‚Äù

Passo 3. Installa gli Aggiornamenti:

Se sono disponibili degli aggiornamenti, installali e riavvia il computer per verificare se l‚Äôerrore di non poter digitare nella barra di ricerca di Windows 10 √® stato risolto.

Soluzione 5: Crea un Nuovo Account Utente

Passo 1. Apri Impostazioni:

Vai su ‚ÄúImpostazioni‚Äù e seleziona ‚ÄúAccount.‚Äù

Passo 2. Naviga verso Famiglia e altri utenti:

Step-by-Step Tutorial for Implementing Norton Ghost Across Various Windows Versions (Windows 11, 10, 8 &)

  1. AOMEI Backupper >
  2. Articles >
  3. How to Use Norton Ghost in Windows 11, 10, 8, 7

Disclaimer: This post includes affiliate links

If you click on a link and make a purchase, I may receive a commission at no extra cost to you.

How to Use Norton Ghost in Windows 11, 10, 8, 7

Want to create an image, restore image, or clone hard drive via Norton Ghost? This guide will tell you how to use Norton Ghost step by step. It also provides you with an easy alternative.

ByLena Updated on June 5, 2024

Share this:

Table of Contents

  1. About Norton Ghost
  2. How to Use Norton Ghost 15 Step by Step
    1. Image Your Computer with Norton Ghost
    2. Restore Image with Norton Ghost
    3. Clone Disk with Norton Ghost
  3. Best Free Alternative to Norton Ghost
    1. Create Image Backup
    2. Restore Disk & Files
    3. Clone Hard Drive
  4. Conclusion
  5. FAQs about Norton Ghost

üåü Key Takeaways:

ToolsNorton GhostAOMEI Backupper
FunctionsImage Your Computer Restore Image Clone Disk Create Image Backup Restore Disk & Files Clone Hard Drive
Pros‚úî Established reputation ‚úî Powerful imaging and cloning ‚úî Support for RAID arrays‚úî User-friendly interface ‚úî Active development ‚úî Comprehensive backup and clone solutions
Cons‚úñ Discontinued ‚úñ Complex interface ‚úñ Compatibility issues‚úñ Advanced features locked in the free version

About Norton Ghost

Norton Ghost is one disk imaging and cloning tool that firstly developed in the 1990s. It can help you make backup images of the whole hard disk, selected partitions or only those files that mean the most to you. When something goes wrong, Norton Ghost can restore your computer to previous functional status . Besides, it can also help you clone one hard drive to another hard drive.

In a word, if you want to make an image back for your computer or want to clone to the new hard drive, Norton Ghost is not a bad choice. However, now Norton Ghost is no longer available for the Home user. It was discontinued by Symantec in 2013. Indeed you can still download the latest version - Norton Ghost 15, but it only offers a 30-day free trial and then you need to pay for it.

How to Use Norton Ghost 15 Step by Step

Here in this guide, you will get the detailed steps about how to use Symantec Ghost in Windows 11/10/8/7. You can simply search ‚ÄúNorton Ghost 15 download‚Äù via your browser to get the tool. As we have mentioned above, it only offers a 30-day free trial. If you prefer a free tool to help you backup, restore or clone your hard drive, you can refer to the next part to get the best free alternative to Norton Ghost.

Image Your Computer with Norton Ghost

1. Install Norton Ghost and open it. It will run a step-by-step wizard the first time you open it. At last, you will see the Easy Setup interface where you can create a backup at once. You can also click the Cancel option and set the backup task later.

2. On the Home screen, you can create a backup task by clicking Define Backup Wizard or Run or Manage Backups. Here we choose the latter one.

3. The Easy Setup screen will appear.

  • You can click OK to accept the default settings or click a setting to modify it.
  • Or you can click Custom‚Ä¶ to create a backup according to your needs.

Click here

4. Finally, click OK to confirm.

Restore Image with Norton Ghost

Click Recover My Files if you want to recover files or folder, or Recover My Computer to make it.

Recover My Files:

1. On Recover My Files screen, you can find the files you want to restore through File and Folder & Recovery Point.

2. Whichever you choose, you can type the file name you need in the box under Find files to recover and click Search to find it.

3. After the scanning, select the file you need and click Recover Files‚Ä¶

Recover My Computer:

On Recover My Computer screen, find and choose the right system restore point and click Recover Now to make it.

üëâ Note: If your computer cannot run Windows normally, you can use the Symantec Recovery Disk CD to help you boot your computer. Depending on which version of the product you have purchased, Symantec Recovery Disk is either included on your product CD or as a separate CD. If you don‚Äôt have a floppy drive, you can create a Norton Ghost Bootable USB instead.

Clone Disk with Norton Ghost

1. Connect your new hard drive to your computer.

2. On the Tools page, click Copy My Hard Drive and follow the steps in the wizard to copy the drive.

üëâ Note: The drivers that are used to run the hardware on one computer will likely not match the drivers on a second computer. So you‚Äôd better not use the Copy Drive feature to set up a hard drive that will be used in another computer.

Best Free Alternative to Norton Ghost

AOMEI Backupper Standard is one backup, restore and clone software designed for Windows users. Support all Windows OS including Windows 11/10/8.1/8/7. It offers more powerful functions compared to Norton Ghost, and it‚Äôs free.

üíú Backup & Restore

  • It offers various backup options for you to choose: system backup , disk/partition backup, file backup and cloud backup.
  • You can create a custom schedule backup based on daily, weekly, monthly, event triggers and USB plug-in mode.
  • You can reduce image size as much as possible with different features, such as compression, splitting, intelligent sector backup, incremental backup, and even without configuring it manually.

üíú Clone

  • Disk Clone: Copy one HDD/SSD/USB drive to another. All data on the source disk will be transferred to the destination. It even allows you to clone larger HDD to smaller SSD and improve SSD disk performance with 4k technology.
  • Partition Clone: Copy a particular partition to another, such as copy NTFS partition.

Download it to have a try! If you are using a server system, such as, server 2003/2008/2012/2016/2019/2022 (including R2 version), try AOMEI Backupper Server !

Download Freeware Win 11/10/8.1/8/7/XP

Secure Download

Create Image Backup

Take disk backup as an example. Follow the step below to backup your computer disk.

1. Click Backup > Disk Backup.

Select the corresponding backup methods if you want to backup system, partition or individual files.

2. Click Add Disk to choose the system disk to be backed up.

3. Choose a destination path to save the disk image. You can save the backup image on a local hard drive, external hard drive, USB flash drive, or network drive, etc. Click Start Backup when you are ready.

üëâ Notes:

  • In case your computer cannot start normally, you can create a bootable media using CD/DVD or USB flash drive in advance to help boot your computer. When your computer goes wrong, you can boot the computer using the bootable media and perform a system restore to get everything back to normal.
  • If you want to upgrade Windows 10 to Windows 11 without losing files, this software is very useful. It backs up everything you want, either in the system partition or entire disk, and you can use it to restore files or system as needed.

Restore Disk & Files

If you have created a backup with AOMEI Backupper, you can easily perform a restore anytime you want. You can choose to restore hard disk drive , the system, partition or files/folders to the point you ever made a backup.

üëâ Notes:

  • With AOMEI Universal Restore feature, you can restore a backup image, system image in particular, created on one computer to another one that has dissimilar hardware installed. It can also help you reinstall the system if you are planning to change the hardware such as motherboard, CPU, etc. Available in higher editions like AOMEI Backupper Professional .
  • If you don‚Äôt create a file backup but you want to perform hard disk image file restore or from other backup types, try the Explore image feature. It requires a professional version as well.

Clone Hard Drive

You can directly clone hard drive to another one with the Disk Clone feature. If you are cloning HDD to SSD, you can make use of the ‚ÄúSSD Alignment‚Äú feature to improve the read/write speed of the destination SSD.

üëâ Notes:

  • The free version of AOMEI Backupper only supports cloning a data disk. To clone a disk with OS installed, you can upgrade to higher versions to enjoy it.
  • The System Clone feature can help you only clone system to new hard drive, which uses less disk space than disk clone. Also, it requires a higher version.

Conclusion

That‚Äôs all for how to use Norton Ghost 15. Indeed Norton Ghost is a good tool for computer backup, restore and clone, but you need to pay for it. Fortunately, there‚Äôs another choice - AOMEI Backupper Standard. This free alternative offers all-around backup options to protect your data all the time.

FAQs about Norton Ghost

1. Is Norton Ghost still available?

Answer: Norton Ghost was officially discontinued by Symantec in 2013. This means that it is no longer available for purchase, and no new updates or official support are provided.

2. Can I still use Norton Ghost on my current system?

Answer: While you can still use Norton Ghost on your system, it may face compatibility issues with newer operating systems and hardware due to its discontinuation and lack of updates.

3. What should I do if I encounter issues with Norton Ghost?

Answer: Since Norton Ghost is discontinued and no longer supported, finding official assistance may be difficult. You might try searching for solutions in user forums, community support sites, or using alternative backup software that is actively supported.

4. How do I migrate my data from Norton Ghost to another backup solution?

Answer: To migrate your data, you can restore your backups created with Norton Ghost to your system and then use another backup solution to create new backups. Alternatively, some backup tools might allow importing Ghost backup files directly.

Qu‚Äôest-ce qu‚Äôun FPS faible et comment puis-je le v√©rifier ?

Si votre jeu commence √† ralentir et que l‚Äôimage est saccad√©e, surtout lorsqu‚Äôelle bouge, c‚Äôest que votre taux d‚Äôimages par seconde (IPS) est faible. Cela se produit lorsque le mat√©riel de votre ordinateur a du mal √† faire fonctionner votre jeu ou fait des heures suppl√©mentaires. S‚Äôil travaille trop, la vitesse du jeu ralentit.

La carte graphique travaille pour rendre les images fixes, ou frames, pendant que vous jouez √† un jeu. Elle travaille en collaboration avec d‚Äôautres composants mat√©riels tels que la RAM, le CPU et le GPU pour cr√©er une exp√©rience de jeu compl√®te. En cas d‚Äôarr√™t de l‚Äôun de ces composants, votre FPS commencera √† baisser. Vous utiliserez davantage de puissance de la carte graphique, mais vous trouverez un juste milieu entre les d√©chirures et le d√©calage.

Pour faire simple, DirectX est l‚Äôapplication que le jeu utilise pour communiquer avec votre ordinateur et lui dire quoi faire. DirectX 12 est une grande am√©lioration par rapport √† son pr√©d√©cesseur, DirectX 11, car il permet aux cartes graphiques de tirer des ressources de plus d‚Äôun c≈ìur du processeur d‚Äôun PC, ce qui augmente les fr√©quences d‚Äôimages, am√©liore les effets graphiques et r√©duit la consommation d‚Äô√©nergie. Cela peut √™tre d√©cevant, c‚Äôest le moins que l‚Äôon puisse dire, surtout si vous √™tes un joueur comp√©titif et que votre sortie non planifi√©e peut affecter vos co√©quipiers ou votre classement.

Mais m√™me en l‚Äôabsence de tels red√©marrages ‚Äúen pleine face‚Äù, qui sont en fait assez rares, le t√©l√©chargement des mises √† jour en arri√®re-plan limite vos vitesses de connexion et occupe la m√©moire vive de votre PC.

G√©rer les mises √† jour automatiques de Steam

Le probl√®me ici est le m√™me qu‚Äôavec Windows Mises √† jour. Steam met automatiquement √† jour tous vos jeux, m√™me ceux auxquels vous n‚Äôavez pas jou√© depuis longtemps. Les mises √† jour en arri√®re-plan consomment la m√©moire de votre PC et peuvent ralentir les processus de jeu.

Pour emp√™cher Steam de mettre √† jour les jeux pendant que vous jouez, allez dans votre client Steam et trouvez les options de mise √† jour dans Steam - Param√®tres - T√©l√©chargements. D√©cochez la case Autoriser les t√©l√©chargements pendant le jeu.

Par ailleurs, les jeux sur Steam sont mis √† jour en permanence et il arrive souvent que de nouveaux bogues apparaissent dans les nouvelles mises √† jour ou que certains √©l√©ments cessent de fonctionner.

Pour ramener la version d‚Äôun jeu √† celle dont vous avez besoin, ouvrez Steam, faites un clic droit sur le jeu, choisissez Propri√©t√©s et allez dans l‚Äôonglet B√™ta. Choisissez la version souhait√©e dans le menu d√©roulant.

D√©sactiver les notifications

Les notifications au milieu d‚Äôun jeu consomment de la puissance CPU et peuvent nuire √† votre champ de vision pendant le jeu. Suivez les √©tapes suivantes pour d√©sactiver toutes les notifications avant de jouer :

  1. Appuyez sur la touche Windows ou cliquez sur l‚Äôic√¥ne Windows en bas √† gauche de votre √©cran.

  3. Lorsque la nouvelle fen√™tre s‚Äôouvre, mettez le commutateur √† bascule situ√© √† c√¥t√© de l‚Äôoption Obtenir des notifications d‚Äôapplications et d‚Äôautres exp√©diteurs sur D√©sactiv√©. Vos notifications sont maintenant d√©sactiv√©es.
  4. Vous pouvez √©galement faire d√©filer la liste et d√©sactiver les notifications par application.

R√©gler le panneau de contr√¥le NVIDIA

Si vous utilisez une carte graphique NVIDIA, il existe des param√®tres sp√©cifiques √† la carte dans le panneau de configuration. Voici quelques-uns des meilleurs param√®tres Windows 10 pour les cartes NVIDIA pour les jeux.

  1. Occlusion ambiante : Activez-la et augmentez son niveau jusqu‚Äô√† 16x.
  2. Filtrage anisotropique : Passez sur Off.
  3. DSR - Facteurs et lissage : D√©sactiver.
  4. Mode faible latence : Activez-le.
  5. Mode de gestion de l‚Äô√©nergie : Passez √† Pr√©f√©rer les performances maximales.
  6. Optimisation Threaded : Passez √† Auto.

R√©gler le centre de contr√¥le AMD/ATI

Les cartes graphiques AMD ont √©galement beaucoup de param√®tres. Certains disent qu‚Äôelles rivalisent m√™me avec leur concurrent NVIDIA. Modifiez ces param√®tres pour optimiser les jeux de Windows 10.

  1. Activez l‚Äôaccentuation des images d‚ÄôAMD en cliquant sur Param√®tres, puis sur Graphiques pour trouver le param√®tre. Vous pouvez l‚Äôactiver pour des jeux individuels ou globalement.
  2. Augmentez vos performances graphiques en utilisant l‚Äôoverclocking. Pour ce faire, cliquez sur l‚Äôonglet Performance, puis sur Tuning, s√©lectionnez Automatique, et enfin GPU Overclocked.
  3. Si vous utilisez une carte AMD, vous n‚Äôavez pas besoin de MSI Afterburner pour contr√¥ler les performances. Il vous suffit d‚Äôappuyer sur Ctrl + Shift + O pour que vos statistiques apparaissent dans le jeu.

R√©duire la r√©solution dans un jeu

Cette solution entre facilement dans la cat√©gorie des ‚Äúsolutions rapides‚Äù. Parfois, votre syst√®me ne peut tout simplement pas g√©rer un jeu, et vous n‚Äôavez pas le temps de chercher des solutions √† plus long terme. Allez dans les param√®tres syst√®me du jeu et r√©duisez la r√©solution d‚Äôun niveau. Surveillez ensuite votre FPS jusqu‚Äô√† ce que les choses s‚Äôam√©liorent.

D√©sactiver l‚Äôacc√©l√©ration de la souris

Celui-ci n‚Äôa rien √† voir avec l‚Äôam√©lioration des performances de votre PC en mati√®re de jeu, mais il s‚Äôagit plut√¥t d‚Äôun conseil pour vous permettre d‚Äôam√©liorer vos performances personnelles en mati√®re de jeu. L‚Äôacc√©l√©ration de la souris est un param√®tre qui fait bouger votre souris en se basant non seulement sur la d√©tection des mouvements physiques mais aussi sur la vitesse. Cette option rend en fait les mouvements de votre souris moins pr√©cis, car elle ajoute un param√®tre suppl√©mentaire au mouvement que vous transmettez √† la souris. √âtant donn√© que la pr√©cision est cruciale pour la pr√©cision de la vis√©e dans les jeux de tir √† la premi√®re personne, si vous √™tes un fan de Call of Duty, Counter-Strike ou Overwatch, vous devriez absolument d√©sactiver cette option.

Pour ce faire, appuyez sur la touche Windows + I. Tapez ‚Äúpointeur de la souris‚Äù dans la zone de recherche. Choisissez Modifier l‚Äôaffichage ou la vitesse du pointeur de la souris. Dans la fen√™tre qui s‚Äôouvre, allez dans l‚Äôonglet Options du pointeur et d√©cochez la case Am√©liorer la pr√©cision du pointeur.

Vous pouvez √©galement modifier le curseur de la vitesse du pointeur pour cr√©er la configuration qui vous convient le mieux.

Comment am√©liorer les performances de jeu sur Windows 10 (corrections avanc√©es)

Vous ne savez toujours pas comment rendre Windows 10 plus rapide pour les jeux ? Utilisez ces correctifs avanc√©s pour une solution √† long terme.

Optez pour un SSD

Passer d‚Äôun disque dur √† un disque SSD n‚Äôam√©liorera pas radicalement les performances de vos jeux, mais cela peut vous aider √† r√©duire consid√©rablement les temps de chargement. Il est vrai que les disques durs SSD peuvent √™tre assez chers et il peut sembler que les temps de chargement ne sont pas une question si importante pour investir votre argent. Mais si ce n‚Äôest probablement pas la premi√®re chose √† laquelle vous pensez lorsque vous acc√©l√©rez votre ordinateur portable, ce n‚Äôest pas non plus la derni√®re. Les jeux d‚Äôaujourd‚Äôhui prennent de plus en plus d‚Äôespace disque, donc si vous voulez jouer aux derniers jeux, passer d‚Äôun disque dur √† un disque SSD peut √™tre un v√©ritable gain de temps et vos temps de chargement de jeu peuvent passer de 30-40 secondes √† 2-3, ce qui est assez significatif.

Quant √† l‚Äôaspect financier, si un gros SSD pour votre syst√®me d‚Äôexploitation et vos jeux est trop cher pour vous, prenez un petit SSD pour votre syst√®me d‚Äôexploitation et gardez un gros disque dur pour les jeux.

Mettez √† niveau votre GPU/CPU

Mettez √† niveau votre GPU et votre CPU environ tous les quatre ans pour que tout fonctionne bien. Mais si vous √™tes un joueur, vous devrez peut-√™tre le faire plus t√¥t, car la technologie √©volue beaucoup plus rapidement dans ce secteur.

Le choix de la premi√®re mise √† niveau d√©pend des types de jeux auxquels vous jouez. Si vous n‚Äôavez pas besoin de graphismes extr√™mes et jouez √† des jeux plus rapides, le processeur est le meilleur choix. Mais si vous aimez les histoires num√©riques ou les jeux bas√©s sur le monde avec beaucoup de personnages et d‚Äôarri√®re-plans non jouables, un GPU pourrait vous √™tre plus utile.

Quoi qu‚Äôil en soit, assurez-vous que l‚Äô√©quilibre des performances entre les deux est d√©licat, car l‚Äôun ne fonctionne pas sans l‚Äôautre. V√©rifiez la m√©moire et la bande passante de toute mise √† niveau potentielle.

Mettez votre RAM √† niveau

La mise √† niveau de votre RAM n‚Äôaura pas un effet aussi important que la mise √† niveau du processeur ou du GPU. Mais elle peut donner √† votre mat√©riel le coup de pouce dont il a besoin pour augmenter votre fr√©quence d‚Äôimages et am√©liorer votre exp√©rience de jeu globale.

De nombreux jeux requi√®rent une m√©moire vive de 8 Go, mais ce chiffre augmente r√©guli√®rement, car les titres les plus r√©cents recommandent une m√©moire vive de 12 Go.

Si vous voulez rester en t√™te de la courbe, 16 Go suffiront pour l‚Äôinstant. Mais si vous voulez utiliser des services de streaming en arri√®re-plan comme Twitch, Discord et YouTube, vous devrez passer √† 32 Go pour pouvoir tout faire fonctionner sans probl√®me.

D√©sactiver l‚Äôalgorithme de Nagle

En gros, l‚Äôalgorithme de Nagle am√©liore l‚Äôefficacit√© des r√©seaux TCP/IP en cr√©ant des paquets de donn√©es, ce qui r√©duit le nombre de paquets √† envoyer sur le r√©seau. Ce processus affecte votre connexion Internet, la rendant moins stable. La d√©sactivation de cet algorithme sur votre PC peut contribuer √† des probl√®mes de latence lorsque vous jouez √† des jeux en ligne.

Ouvrez votre Windows √âditeur de registre en cliquant sur la touche Windows + Q, en tapant ‚Äúregedit‚Äù et en cliquant sur le fichier regedit. Faites d√©filer le menu HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE pour trouver le chemin suivant : ‚Äú\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\Tcpip\Parameters\Interface‚Äù. Cela vous m√®nera au menu qui comprend des dossiers avec de nombreux chiffres et lettres. Pour acc√©der au bon fichier, faites correspondre votre adresse IP √† l‚Äôadresse DhcpIPAddress list√©e dans l‚Äôun de ces dossiers.

Pour trouver votre adresse IP, appuyez sur la touche Windows + X et suivez ces √©tapes : Panneau de configuration - R√©seau et Internet - Centre R√©seau et partage - Connexions - D√©tails - Adresse IPv4.

Vous pouvez maintenant retrouver le dossier avec la bonne adresse IP. Cliquez avec le bouton droit de la souris sur ce dossier et s√©lectionnez Nouveau - Valeur DWORD (32 bits). Vous devrez cr√©er deux de ces valeurs : TcpAckFrequency et TCPNoDelay. Double-cliquez sur chacune d‚Äôelles et r√©glez leurs param√®tres sur 1. L‚Äôalgorithme de Nagle est maintenant d√©sactiv√©.

Surcadencez votre carte graphique

Overclocker vos cartes graphiques signifie les pousser au-del√† des sp√©cifications affich√©es sur la bo√Æte. De nombreuses cartes r√©centes disposent d‚Äôune fonction automatique permettant de le faire dans les param√®tres de contr√¥le, mais il existe √©galement des moyens de le faire manuellement. Veillez √† bien conna√Ætre votre carte graphique, car si vous repoussez ses limites, elle risque de surchauffer.

Pour overclocker :

  1. V√©rifiez les param√®tres standard ou de r√©f√©rence de votre carte.
  2. Utilisez un programme comme MSI Afterburner pour augmenter l‚Äôhorloge centrale de la carte. Faites-le par intervalles de 10 MHz et r√©initialisez les benchmarks au fur et √† mesure.
  3. En option, vous pouvez √©galement augmenter le voltage et l‚Äôhorloge de la m√©moire, mais surveillez de pr√®s la temp√©rature de votre carte lorsque vous faites cela.
  4. Jouez √† un jeu et v√©rifiez les performances.

D√©sactiver SysMain et Prefetch

C‚Äôest l‚Äôun des services faciles √† d√©sactiver sur Windows 10. Ces programmes essaient de vous aider √† acc√©der plus rapidement aux donn√©es, mais ils ajoutent finalement des op√©rations inutiles qui ralentissent les jeux. Voici comment les d√©sactiver :

Comment acc√©l√©rer l‚Äôex√©cution des jeux sur un ordinateur portable Windows 10

Vous voulez savoir comment am√©liorer les performances de jeu sur un ordinateur portable Windows 10 ? Ces conseils vous aideront √† acc√©l√©rer les choses !

Windows 10 dispose de nombreuses fonctions d‚Äô√©conomie d‚Äô√©nergie pour les ordinateurs portables afin de les maintenir en vie pendant de plus longues dur√©es. Pour rem√©dier √† ce probl√®me, connectez votre ordinateur portable √† son alimentation externe et assurez-vous que vos param√®tres de contr√¥le permettent d‚Äôobtenir des performances optimales lorsqu‚Äôil est connect√©.

Emp√™chez votre ordinateur portable de surchauffer

Les ordinateurs portables sont r√©put√©s pour leur surchauffe, car tous les composants sont serr√©s dans le ch√¢ssis et l‚Äôair circule peu. En cas de surchauffe, le syst√®me ralentit et les performances de jeu aussi. Utilisez ces conseils de pr√©vention :

  1. V√©rifiez et nettoyez toujours vos ventilateurs.

  3. R√©glez les param√®tres de vos ventilateurs pour qu‚Äôils ne soient pas trop sollicit√©s.
  4. Si vous le pouvez, jouez sur votre ordinateur portable dans un environnement frais.

Mettez √† niveau votre GPU et votre RAM

Nous avons d√©j√† abord√© ce sujet pour les PC, mais votre ordinateur portable peut √©galement √™tre √©quip√© d‚Äôun processeur graphique et d‚Äôune m√©moire vive. Suivez les m√™mes protocoles, et si vous n‚Äôavez pas l‚Äôhabitude de travailler avec des ordinateurs portables, il est pr√©f√©rable de confier l‚Äôinstallation √† un technicien exp√©riment√©.

D√©sactiver les services d‚Äôarri√®re-plan Windows

Les ordinateurs portables sont souvent √©quip√©s de nombreux services d‚Äôarri√®re-plan qui fonctionnent pour √©viter la surchauffe et optimiser les performances avec des composants plus petits. Ces services peuvent facilement nuire aux performances de jeu s‚Äôils ne sont pas d√©sactiv√©s. Voici les √©tapes √† suivre :

  1. Appuyez sur les touches Windows + R et utilisez l‚Äôinvite Ex√©cuter.

R√©sum√©

Nous esp√©rons que cet article vous a donn√© quelques id√©es sur la fa√ßon de faire fonctionner les jeux plus rapidement sur Windows 10 et d‚Äôam√©liorer votre exp√©rience de jeu. Voici quelques-uns des principaux conseils √† utiliser pour optimiser votre syst√®me :

  • Modifiez les param√®tres de vos jeux : Vous pouvez √©ventuellement modifier des √©l√©ments comme la r√©solution, le flou de mouvement et l‚Äôanticr√©nelage.

  • Modifiez les param√®tres de votre carte graphique : Les cartes graphiques modernes ont leurs propres param√®tres que vous pouvez ajuster pour optimiser votre syst√®me pour les jeux. V√©rifiez les param√®tres de l‚Äôocclusion ambiante, du filtrage anisotropique et du DSR.

Foire aux questions

Comment optimiser mon ordinateur pour les jeux ?

L‚Äôarticle ci-dessus √©num√®re une s√©rie de mesures que vous pouvez prendre pour optimiser votre ordinateur portable ou de bureau pour les jeux. Voici les principaux conseils :

Qu‚Äôest-ce qui ralentit mon ordinateur ?

Il y a une longue liste de choses qui pourraient ralentir votre ordinateur. Voici une liste de raisons que vous pouvez v√©rifier :

  1. L‚Äôalgorithme de Nagle est activ√©

Windows 10 est-il meilleur pour les jeux ?

Lorsque l‚Äôon compare l‚Äôexp√©rience de jeu des versions pr√©c√©dentes de Windows √† Windows 10, l‚Äôam√©lioration des performances est extraordinaire. Si vous n‚Äô√™tes pas s√ªr de vouloir faire une mise √† jour, la d√©cision est simple. Windows 10 offrira toujours une meilleure exp√©rience.

Comment obtenir 60 fps dans un jeu ?

Atteindre 60 FPS dans un jeu n‚Äôest pas diff√©rent des conseils pour acc√©l√©rer votre syst√®me en g√©n√©ral, mais voici ce que vous pouvez faire :

Pourquoi ai-je des fps faibles sur mon PC haut de gamme ?

La baisse du nombre de FPS se produit lorsque votre ordinateur n‚Äôa pas la m√©moire ou la puissance n√©cessaire pour faire tourner le jeu √† pleine vitesse. Parmi les probl√®mes les plus courants √† l‚Äôorigine d‚Äôune baisse du nombre d‚Äôimages par seconde, citons les pilotes de cartes graphiques obsol√®tes, les cartes graphiques de qualit√© inf√©rieure, les vieux processeurs et le manque de m√©moire vive.

Ce n‚Äôest pas parce que vous d√©pensez de l‚Äôargent pour un ordinateur qu‚Äôil est √©quip√© du dernier cri. En outre, les jeux vid√©o modernes placent toujours la barre plus haut en mati√®re de capacit√© de performance, ce qui est donc relatif d‚Äôun jeu √† l‚Äôautre.

How to Recover Files from Ransomware Attack [Full Guide 2022]

This page covers 4 ways on how to recover files from ransomware and offers some tips that can help you prevent ransomware attacks.

ByKelsey / Updated on April 2, 2024

Share this:

Table of Contents

  1. Is it possible to recover data from ransomware?
  2. How to recover files from ransomware attack in 4 ways
    1. Method 1. Recover files from ransomware with data recovery software
    2. Method 2. Recover ransomware infected files via Backup and Restore
    3. Method 3. Get back files from ransomware using File History
    4. Method 4. Recover from ransomware through system restore
  3. Conclusion

Is it possible to recover data from ransomware?

I‚Äôm looking at a computer after it‚Äôs been hit by some ransomware. The files have been encrypted. I am trying some guides in removal and recovery, but they don‚Äôt seem to be of much help. If you have suggestions on how to recover files from ransomware, I would appreciate it.

When a storage device or computer is infected by a ransomware virus, your files may be encrypted, deleted, hidden, or modified, and inaccessible. Fortunately, aside from paying for a decryption key, there are several easy and free ways that you can use to perform ransomware data recovery.

If you are looking for methods on how to recover ransomware-infected files, you have come to the right place. In the following chapter, we will show you some practical ways to recover lost data from ransomware attacks.

How to recover files from ransomware attack in 4 ways

Many solutions are available for you to solve how to recover data from ransomware attacks. We have selected some easy-to-implement methods for you. Read below for detailed information.

Method 1. Recover files from ransomware with data recovery software

Usually, ransomware removes the original data after the intrusion. The encrypted files it creates are not the original files, but copies. Therefore, with the help of professional data recovery software, you can easily retrieve your original files deleted by ransomware.

MyRecover is fully-featured ransomware data recovery software that allows you to restore lost data from infected hard drives under trojan, malware, worms, and various virus attacks, and from system crashes.

With this tool, you can recover deleted files , photos, audio, music, emails, and hundreds of other types of files without any effort. It supports you to recover lost data from hard drives, USB flash drives, memory cards, SD cards, emptied Recycle Bin, etc.

Simply download and install this software on your computer, and then follow the steps below to learn how to recover data from ransomware:

Download SoftwareWin 11/10/8/7/Server

Secure Download

Step 1. Select location and start scan

Run MyRecover, hover the mouse over the drive and click Scan to scan.. If your files are lost from an external hard drive like a USB drive, please plug it into your PC in advance.

Step 2. Locate and preview your lost/deleted files

The recovery tool will automatically start looking for all the deleted and lost files.

Step 3. Recover selected files

You can expand the Deleted files folder and Other missing files folder to select the desired items, then click Recover x files to begin ransomware attack recovery now.

Method 2. Recover ransomware infected files via Backup and Restore

If you have a backup available, restoring files is as simple as ABC. You can easily recover encrypted files by finding the corresponding backup file and restoring the data you need. But this option is possible only when you regularly back up your data.

The how to recover ransomware encrypted files guide is instructed as follows. You can simply initiate a data restoration from Windows backup created through the Backup and Restore software when all your files have been encrypted by ransomware.

Step 1. Open Control Panel and click on System and Security. Then, hit Backup and Restore (Windows 7).

Step 2. Tap on the Restore my files position in the Restore tab.

Step 3. Click Browse for files to locate your lost data and choose to save your recovered files in your original location or another destination as needed.

Method 3. Get back files from ransomware using File History

If you have used File History to save a copy of your precious data, you can follow the steps below to figure out how to recover encrypted files from ransomware. You can use this tool to recover permanently deleted folders and files on your computer as well.

Step 1. Go to Control Panel > System and Security, and click on File History.

Click here

Step 2. Press the Restore personal files button on the left panel. Please make sure your File History is turned on.

Step 3. Find the files you want to recover and click the arrow pointing left or right to choose the version you need. And then, click the Recover button.

Method 4. Recover from ransomware through system restore

If you have created a restore point for your system, the system restore can bring your PC back to a previous point in time. This means that you can get back files on your computer that have been encrypted by ransomware through a system restore point.

Next, let‚Äôs have a look at how to recover files infected by ransomware from a system restore.

Step 1. Press Win + S to open the Windows search box, type Create a restore point, and click Open from the list of results.

Click here

Step 2. Click on System Restore > Next.

Step 3. Choose a restore point from the list and tap on Scan for affected programs to check the items that will be deleted after the restore. Then, click Close.

Step 4. Press Next. Confirm the selected restore point and click Finish. Then, hit Yes to begin the recovery of deleted files .

If there is no restore point, it might be because the system protection isn‚Äôt turned on. You can check Protection Settings on the System Protection tab. If the Protection Settings for your system drive shows as Off, you can click on Configure > Turn on System protection, and then OK to turn it on.

Notes:‚úé‚Ä¶

Some ransomware decryption tools can help to decrypt files encrypted by ransomware. However, such tools do not fully guarantee that ransomware-encrypted files can be recovered. Thus, recovering files infected by ransomware using a ransomware recovery service like MyRecover or with the help of a backup file are the easiest and most workable ways.

Some tips on preventing ransomware

To prevent ransomware from attacking your computer and files again, we list several tips for you:

  • Make sure the antivirus software is enabled on the computer.
  • Don‚Äôt click on emails and connections sent by strangers.
  • Report ransomware attacks to let authorities identify the attacker.
  • Regularly back up important data in case of emergencies.

Conclusion

Ransomware can‚Äôt be prevented. Though there are multiple ways for you to accomplish how to recover files from ransomware, prevention is easier than rescue. We highly recommend you backup your important data periodically.
